channel.title: Make it snow
channel.description:
anyone no how to make it snow? i've tryed MANY things and it just won't work...
help please ;] all i need left to finish my x-mas event :D

will this work on every server? and do i need any other files? and [317] yeh?

item.title: Make it snow
item.dc:creator: @pkpoison pkpoison
item.description:
@pkpoison wrote:

First Step:
Add this Method in client.java

public void NewWeather(int weatherId) 
{ 
        outStream.createFrame(208); 
        outStream.writeWordBigEndian_dup(weatherId); 
        weather = weatherId;     
}

Final step:
Add this to boolean process.

        if(SnowOn) 
                NewWeather(11877);

And add this in players.java

public boolean SnowOn = true;

Declare this int in player.java

public int weather = 1;

credits - Universal-X

Read full topic

} else if (command.startsWith(“snowingzz 1”)) {
IsSnowing = 1;

Sorry can’t help better :F
